text: Seems like something that can be addressed if there’s an actual problem, but not worth taking preemptive measures over. My impression was that the people who ‘hate’ him, hate his policies, not his personality and are not very irritated by memes like this

text: I didn't mean that they'd be unfomfortable with seeing it, I mean that it would be off-putting to Julia
